name: PIPE (itch) (Noh)
description:
Originally made for

Trijam 162: Its all connected

A very original game where your controller is connected to everything exept the bird. To compensate for the lack of player, is the bird controlled by a CPU. Don't let it crash into the pipes!

CONTROLS

X/V Bounce Pipes Z/C (?)

An updated version is ready to be launched after the Jam ends!
